message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a fair share, now it's your turn.
Let's meet in the middle and split it 50/50, it's a fair start!
I'm not sure I want to give up 400,000, let's see if we can do better.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more for myself.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think 50/50 is a fair split. You're getting a good deal!
I'm not convinced that 50/50 is the best deal, let's keep negotiating.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out.
I'm willing to give you a bigger chunk, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. You're getting a good deal, but I'm not giving away too much!
I'm not getting the deal I want, I'll try to push for more.
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I need to get closer to my target.
I'm not going to give away too much more. You're getting a good deal, but I need to hold on to some value. It's getting close to the end, let's make a move!
I'm not getting the deal I want, I'll try to push for more in the remaining rounds.
I'm making a strong final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to accept such a lopsided offer. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my final offer!
I'm not getting the deal I want, I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this.
This is my last chance, take it or walk away!
I'm not going to accept this offer. I'm willing to walk away and take nothing rather than accept such a bad deal. You've had your chances, Alice.
Fine, I'll take the deal. Better than walking away with nothing!
